Article Title: MLB trade rumors: Los Angeles Dodgers could re-sign $25 million New York Yankees star to bolster roster and improve championship odds
Article Text:
Colorado Rockies at Los Angeles Dodgers (Image via Imagn).

Los Angeles Dodgers

Cody Bellinger

Los Angeles Dodgers Eyeing a Familiar Star

Cody Bellinger‚Äôs Career Revival

Cody Bellinger (Image via Getty)

Period Batting Average On-Base Percentage Slugging OPS+ WAR Games Played 2019‚Äì2022

Free Agency and Potential Bidding War

Teams Likely to Pursue Cody Bellinger

Team Reason for Interest Los Angeles Dodgers



Familiarity and need for a left-handed bat



New York Yankees

Chicago Cubs



Past success and strong organizational fit





Why a Reunion Makes Sense

Themay be looking toward a major reunion this offseason, as reports suggest the team could make a push to bring back former MVP and World Series champion. After a roller-coaster regular season and an unexpected postseason surge, the Dodgers‚Äô front office could be planning a familiar move to bolster their lineup once again.Following a strong postseason showing and an inspiring 10-game winning streak before falling to the Philadelphia Phillies in the NLDS, the Los Angeles Dodgers proved they still have the potential to compete at the highest level. Manager Dave Roberts‚Äô fiery comments after sweeping the Milwaukee Brewers captured the team‚Äôs mindset.‚ÄúBefore this season started, they said the Dodgers are ruining baseball. Let‚Äôs get four more wins and really ruin baseball,‚Äù Roberts said on the air. (H/t: Sporting News)While Los Angeles is still focused on chasing championships, the offseason could bring a strategic reunion that excites fans - one involving a two-time All-Star and one of the most popular Dodgers of recent years.Cody Bellinger, who won the 2019 NL MVP with the Los Angeles Dodgers, saw a drastic dip in performance over the next three seasons. During that time, he hit just .203/.272/.376 with a 76 OPS+ across 1,143 plate appearances, which ultimately led to the Dodgers non-tendering him.However, since leaving Los Angeles, Bellinger has rediscovered his form. Over the past three seasons, he‚Äôs posted a 125 OPS+ and accumulated 12.0 WAR in 412 games, proving that his prime years may not be over yet.According to Bleacher Report‚Äôs Joel Reuter, ‚ÄúAfter winning NL MVP in 2019, Cody Bellinger hit a combined .203/.272/.376 for a 76 OPS+ over 1,143 plate appearances in the three years that followed, which ultimately led to him being non-tendered. In three years since he left, he has a 125 OPS+ and 12.0 WAR in 412 games, and he could be atop the Los Angeles Dodgers list of potential targets to replace Michael Conforto as a left-handed hitting outfielder. ‚ÄùBellinger is expected to opt out of his current deal with the New York Yankees, where he recently experienced a resurgence. ESPN‚Äôs Jorge Castillo reported that ‚ÄúAs expected, New York Yankees outfielder Cody Bellinger plans to opt out of his contract and become a free agent next month, a source told ESPN. Bellinger, 30, has a $25 million player option for next season. After a rebound season in his first year in pinstripes, he presumably will receive widespread interest in free agency - it should yield a lucrative multi-year contract. ‚ÄùThis move could set the stage for a fierce bidding war between top contenders, including the Los Angeles Dodgers, who have the financial strength to compete for big-name free agents.Bellinger‚Äôs defensive versatility adds further appeal. He‚Äôs capable of playing center field, first base, and right field at a high level - traits that fit seamlessly into Dave Roberts‚Äô flexible lineup approach. For the Dodgers, reuniting with Cody Bellinger wouldn‚Äôt just be about nostalgia; it would be a calculated move to strengthen both offense and defense.Also read: MLB trade rumors: Boston Red Sox could sign $180 million Houston Astros All-Star to replace Lucas Giolito as rotation upgrade The Los Angeles Dodgers have the money, the motivation, and the familiarity to make a reunion with Cody Bellinger a reality. As free agency approaches, all signs point toward a potential homecoming that could reignite memories of their 2020 World Series run - this time with Bellinger back in Dodger blue, aiming for redemption and another championship push.
Article Summary: Cody bellinger won the 2019 nl mvp with the los angeles dodgers. He is expected to opt out of his current deal with the new york yankees. Bellinger has rediscovered his form over the past three seasons, posting a 125 ops+ and 12.0 war in 412 games.

Article Title: Will Michael Penix Jr. play against the San Francisco 49ers tonight? Latest injury update on the Atlanta Falcons' quarterback
Article Text:
All eyes are on Michael Penix Jr.(Image via Jeffrey Becker-Imagn Images)

Is the Atlanta Falcons‚Äô star player, Michael Penix Jr., taking the field against the San Francisco 49ers tonight?





Michael Penix Jr.‚Äôs injury update as he gears up to face the San Francisco 49ers tonight





The Atlanta Falcons have had an average start to the season as the team has managed to win in only three out of the six matches played so far in the new season. The Atlanta Falcons have lost against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, the Carolina Panthers and the Minnesota Vikings so far. As the team gears up to face the San Francisco 49ers, all eyes are on their star player, Michael Penix Jr.Yes, the Atlanta Falcons‚Äô quarterback, Michael Penix Jr., is all set to play against the San Francisco 49ers tonight at the Levi‚Äôs Stadium.At this point in time, the Atlanta Falcons‚Äô injury report does not feature Michael Penix Jr. on it. But the team has officially ruled out rookies Jalon Walker and Billy Bowman Jr., who have both sustained brutal soft tissue injuries and are working on their recoveries.Michael Penix did suffer a few brutal injuries in the last few seasons, including two ACL tears in 2018 and 2020, and two shoulder injuries in 2019 and in 2021.However, the Atlanta Falcons‚Äô star player has now fully recovered from the brutal injuries and is fully focused on the new season.As the Atlanta Falcons won against the Buffalo Bills in their recent match, Michael Penix Jr.reflected on the team‚Äôs performance.He said, ‚ÄúObviously, we had that one game that we didn't like, that Carolina game, not putting up any points on the board‚Ä¶‚ÄùThe Atlanta Falcons‚Äô star player said, ‚ÄúBut I knew that wasn't us, so I didn't soak into that and get in my feelings about that game, because I knew that wasn't us that day. I knew that wasn't me that day. As long as we continue to trust in each other and go out there and play for one another, we'll be fine.‚ÄùThe exciting match between the San Francisco 49ers and the Atlanta Falcons is all set to begin at 5:20 pm P.T. at Levi‚Äôs Stadium.Also Read: Will Brock Purdy play against the Atlanta Falcons today? Latest injury update on the San Francisco 49ers' quarterback
Article Summary: All eyes are on michael penix jr. as he gears up to face the san francisco 49ers tonight. The atlanta falcons have had an average start to the season as the team has managed to win in only three out of the six matches played so far in the new season.

Article Title: NBA trade rumors: Boston Celtics predicted to land $186 million Milwaukee Bucks superstar to form deadly duo with Jayson Tatum
Article Text:
Jayson Tatum and Jaylen Brown (Image via Getty)

Boston Celtics

Giannis Antetokounmpo

How Giannis Could Be a Potential Game-Changer for the Boston Celtics

Horror at NBA YoungBoy Show: Elderly Usher Beaten, Teen ARRESTED After Viral Video | WATCH

Proposed Trade Breakdown

Team Receives Boston Celtics Giannis Antetokounmpo, Myles Turner, Bobby Portis



Milwaukee Bucks Jaylen Brown, Anfernee Simons, Sam Hauser, Xavier Tillman, 2 First-Round Picks





Giannis Antetokounmpo (Image via USA Today)

Why the Trade Could Make Sense

Key Impacts of the Trade

What It Means for Giannis Antetokounmpo and the Bucks

Thecould be on the verge of one of the biggest shake-ups in franchise history. With Jayson Tatum sidelined for most, if not all, of the 2025-26 NBA season due to a severe Achilles injury, the team might consider a bold move to keep their championship window alive - one that involves acquiring Milwaukee Bucks superstarTatum‚Äôs absence leaves a massive void, but Jaylen Brown is expected to carry the offensive load. Still, as reported by Fansided‚Äôs Matt Moore, Boston could benefit from thinking long-term by making a blockbuster trade with Milwaukee - one that would bring a generational player to TD Garden.According to Moore, the proposed trade would send Jaylen Brown, Anfernee Simons, Sam Hauser, Xavier Tillman, and two first-round picks to the Bucks. In return, the Boston Celtics would receive Giannis Antetokounmpo, Myles Turner, and Bobby Portis.Moore described the potential deal as painful but transformative for both sides. He wrote, ‚ÄúObviously, Jaylen Brown is the best player in any of these packages that the Bucks can get back. A good-to-great player, in his prime, on a long-term contract. It would be painful for the Boston Celtics to make this trade‚Ä¶ but Boston gets to instantly reorganize their future. It‚Äôs now Tatum coming back from the Achilles with Derrick White and Giannis.That‚Äôs your core for the next four years.‚Äù (H/t: Sporting News)The Boston Celtics‚Äô current roster is talented, but losing Tatum for a long stretch threatens to stall their momentum. Adding Giannis Antetokounmpo, one of the league‚Äôs most dominant forwards, could immediately revitalize the team‚Äôs championship aspirations.Meanwhile, the Bucks would gain valuable depth and flexibility, particularly with Myles Turner anchoring their frontcourt and shifting their system from a wing-heavy to a more balanced inside-out structure.‚Ä¢ For Boston: Forms a new core of Giannis, Tatum, and Derrick White, ensuring long-term competitiveness.‚Ä¢ For Milwaukee: Gains multiple starting-caliber players and future assets to build around post-Giannis era.‚Ä¢ For Giannis: Offers a fresh start with a championship-caliber franchise while pairing with a Top 15-20 player in Tatum once he returns. Giannis Antetokounmpo , who signed a massive $175 million contract, remains one of the NBA‚Äôs most valuable players. Yet, if Milwaukee‚Äôs postseason struggles continue, his patience could wear thin. A slow or uncompetitive start to the 2025-26 season might open the door for the Boston Celtics to swoop in.The 6-foot-11 forward has made it clear that he wants to maximize his prime years. If the Bucks fail to show signs of progress, a change of scenery might become inevitable. Boston‚Äôs combination of organizational stability and future star power could be exactly what he‚Äôs looking for.While the deal is purely hypothetical for now, it represents the kind of forward-thinking move that could redefine both franchises. Boston would get a generational talent ready to lead alongside Tatum once he‚Äôs healthy, while Milwaukee could reset with a deep, versatile roster.Also read: NBA trade rumors: Los Angeles Lakers Predicted to sign $186 million Milwaukee Bucks NBA All-Star to form deadly duo with Luka Doncic As the new season unfolds, all eyes will be on how Giannis Antetokounmpo and the Bucks perform early. An unconvincing start could make this blockbuster trade pitch more realistic than fans might think.
Article Summary: The boston celtics could be on the verge of one of the biggest shake-ups in franchise history. With jayson tatum sidelined for most, if not all, of the 2025-26 nba season due to a severe achilles injury, the team might consider a bold move to keep their championship window alive.

Article Title: Miami Dolphins make bold QB move: Quinn Ewers steps up as Tua Tagovailoa‚Äôs backup for Week 7 vs Browns
Article Text:
Quinn Ewers steps up as Dolphins‚Äô QB backup (Image via: Getty images)

Quinn Ewers confirmed as Dolphins ‚Äô backup to Tua Tagovailoa for Week 7

Zach Wilson moved to third-string as Dolphins adjust QB depth chart





The Miami Dolphins are making a bold quarterback move ahead of their Week 7 clash against the Cleveland Browns. Tua Tagovailoa remains the starter, but rookie Quinn Ewers will now serve as his backup, replacing Zach Wilson. Miami is preparing for a challenging game in Cleveland‚Äôs windy, wet conditions while testing their quarterback depth.According to NFL Network insider Ian Rapoport, Quinn Ewers will be active as the backup to Tua Tagovailoa for the Dolphins‚Äô matchup against the Browns. Zach Wilson has been moved to the third-string role. This marks Ewers‚Äô first time active in an NFL game, highlighting Miami‚Äôs confidence in the rookie‚Äôs ability to step up under pressure. The move also gives Ewers a chance to make his NFL debut in a potentially high-stakes environment.Ewers, who played his final season at Texas, threw for 3,472 passing yards with 31 touchdowns and 12 interceptions, leading the SEC in touchdown passes. In the Dolphins‚Äô preseason, he went 23-of-43 for 273 yards and two touchdowns, taking four sacks but committing no turnovers. These performances signal that Ewers is ready to contribute when called upon.Miami‚Äôs $6 million offseason signing, Zach Wilson, is now the third-string quarterback. This season, Wilson completed 29-of-45 passes for 327 yards, one touchdown, and seven sacks, avoiding turnovers. The Dolphins‚Äô decision to prioritize Ewers reflects their focus on building depth and evaluating rookie talent for long-term success. Wilson‚Äôs demotion highlights Miami‚Äôs growing trust in rookie quarterback Quinn Ewers, who continues to draw attention as one of the most promising young passers in the AFC.With Tua Tagovailoa starting and Ewers as the backup, Miami is prepared for any scenario in Cleveland. The windy and wet conditions could make the quarterback position crucial if a substitution is required. This move also gives Ewers a chance to make an early NFL impact and shows Miami‚Äôs strategic approach to managing their quarterback room.The Dolphins‚Äô Week 7 quarterback change demonstrates the team‚Äôs commitment to preparing for adversity and developing rookie talent. Quinn Ewers‚Äô elevation to backup marks a significant step in his NFL journey and could play a key role in Miami‚Äôs Week 7 game against the Browns. If Ewers sees game action, it could offer a glimpse into Miami‚Äôs future at quarterback ‚Äî a storyline that could define their 2025 NFL campaign.Also Read: Could Dolphins‚Äô Anthony Weaver jump ship after 2025 disaster? Titans eye defensive coach for head job
Article Summary: Quinn ewers will be active as the dolphins‚Äô backup to tua tagovailoa. Zach wilson has been moved to the third-string role. Miami is preparing for a challenging game in cleveland‚Äôs windy, wet conditions while testing their quarterback depth.

Article Title: Bryce Young injury update: Panthers quarterback exits game vs. Jets after ankle scare
Article Text:
Bryce Young injury update: Panthers quarterback exits game vs. Jets after ankle scare (Image Via Getty)

Bryce Young‚Äôs injury and Panthers‚Äô victory

Jacksonville Jaguars coach Liam Coen reflects after loss to Rams

Carolina Panthers quarterback Bryce Young was forced to leave Sunday‚Äôs game against the New York Jets after hurting his ankle late in the third quarter. The game was held at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey, on October 19, 2025. Young had completed 15 of 25 passes for 138 yards and a touchdown when the injury happened. The top pick of the 2023 NFL Draft limped off the field after a sack by Jets linebacker Jowon Briggs. The Panthers were leading 13-3 at the time, and backup quarterback Andy Dalton stepped in to finish the game, helping Carolina secure a 13-6 win, their third straight victory for the first time since 2021.Bryce Young‚Äôs last play came when New York‚Äôs Jowon Briggs hit his ankle during a sack. Young immediately left the field and went to the locker room. He did not return for the rest of the game.Despite the injury, the Panthers managed to hold on to their lead. Andy Dalton came in and completed 4 of 7 passes for 60 yards. Carolina‚Äôs defense stayed strong, allowing only a late touchdown to the Jets.Panthers head coach Frank Reich praised Young‚Äôs toughness but confirmed that the team would monitor the injury closely over the next few days.The victory marked a positive note for the Panthers, who are showing consistency this season despite the quarterback setback.Also Read: Who Are Myles Garrett‚Äôs Parents? Everything To Know About Audrey And Lawrence Garrett Meanwhile, Jacksonville Jaguars head coach Liam Coen faced a difficult day after his team lost 35-7 to the Los Angeles Rams at Wembley Stadium in London on October 19, 2025. Coen admitted he needed to take responsibility for the team‚Äôs mistakes.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs definitely frustrating, but just like everybody else in there, you‚Äôve got to look inward first,‚Äù Coen said. The Jaguars struggled early, committing 13 penalties for 119 yards and giving up a touchdown due to an illegal block by Jarrian Jones.Quarterback Trevor Lawrence completed 23 of 48 passes for 296 yards and one touchdown but acknowledged slow starts are an issue. Coen also noted that rookie Travis Hunter had a career-high performance with eight receptions for 101 yards and his first touchdown.The Jaguars will use the upcoming bye week to evaluate personnel and make potential lineup adjustments before facing the Las Vegas Raiders on November 2.
Article Summary: Carolina panthers quarterback bryce young was forced to leave sunday‚Äôs game against the new york jets after hurting his ankle late in the third quarter. The game was held at metlife stadium in east rutherford, new jersey, on october 19, 2025. Backup quarterback andy dalton stepped in to finish the game, helping carolina secure a 13-6 win.

Article Title: Tears in dugout: Smriti Mandhana breaks down as India stare at World Cup exit
Article Text:
Smriti Mandhana (ICC Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Women's World Cup prediction: Greenstone Lobo explains which team has best chance to win

NEW DELHI: Four-time champions England booked their spot in the semi-finals of the Women‚Äôs World Cup after a nail-biting four-run win over hosts India in Indore on Sunday. England posted a competitive 288/8, anchored by Heather Knight‚Äôs classy century, and held their nerve in the field to defend it, despite their bowling, usually their strength, being slightly off-colour.India looked on course for victory, needing just 62 runs from the last 10 overs with seven wickets in hand. But the dismissal of Smriti Mandhana shifted the momentum. The elegant left-hander, who had been anchoring the chase, danced down the track to left-arm spinner Linsey Smith but failed to clear long-off. Soon after, Richa Ghosh and Deepti Sharma fell in quick succession, leaving the tail exposed. As the match slipped away, Mandhana struggled to control her tears, a poignant reminder of how close India had come.Deepti Sharma, after reaching her half-century, attempted a risky slog sweep against Sophie Ecclestone and was caught at deep mid-wicket, sealing England‚Äôs victory."We probably needed 300, but we did well to pull things back and I'm very happy. Didn't contribute much in the last couple of games, so it felt good to come up with a match-winning hundred," said Knight, whose 109 off 91 balls, laced with 15 fours and a six, powered England‚Äôs innings.England‚Äôs openers gave them a brisk start with 73 runs for the first wicket before Knight and captain Nat Sciver-Brunt stitched a 113-run stand to keep the scoreboard ticking. At one point, England seemed set to breach 300, but Knight‚Äôs run out during a second run triggered a slowdown. Deepti Sharma finished with four wickets, keeping India in the hunt.The defeat marked India‚Äôs third consecutive loss, leaving their next clash against New Zealand a virtual knockout. Both teams are on four points, and only a win in both remaining games, along with favourable results elsewhere, will keep India‚Äôs semi-final hopes alive."Not sure how we lost this game. We had it in the bag. We've worked so hard and when the last five overs slip away from you, it's heartbreaking. This is the third straight game we've lost after coming so close," lamented India captain Harmanpreet Kaur, reflecting the anguish felt by the team and particularly by Mandhana, whose heartbreak underlined how agonisingly close India came to victory.
Article Summary: England beat india by four runs to reach the women's world cup semi-finals. Heather knight scored 109 off 91 balls, laced with 15 fours and a six. Deepti sharma finished with four wickets, keeping india in the hunt.

Article Title: How India can still qualify for Women's World Cup semifinals after defeat to England - scenarios explained
Article Text:
Image credit: BCCI Women

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Women's World Cup prediction: Greenstone Lobo explains which team has best chance to win

SCENARIO 1 ‚Äì WIN BOTH MATCHES:

India beat New Zealand and Bangladesh.

Result: India qualifies for the semifinals regardless of other results.

SCENARIO 2 ‚Äì LOSE TO NEW ZEALAND:

India lose to New Zealand.

Then, India hope New Zealand lose their final match against England.

India must beat Bangladesh to advance.

SCENARIO 3 ‚Äì WIN vs NEW ZEALAND, LOSE vs BANGLADESH:

India beat New Zealand but lose to Bangladesh.

New Zealand must defeat England in their final match.

The team with the better net run-rate (India or New Zealand) will progress to the semifinals.

NEW DELHI: India‚Äôs Women‚Äôs World Cup campaign is on a knife-edge after another agonising defeat. Chasing a target of 289 against England in Indore on Sunday, India fell just four runs short, marking their third consecutive loss in the tournament. With the win, England secured a semifinal berth alongside South Africa and Australia, leaving only one spot up for grabs. India currently sit fourth in the points table with four points from five matches (NRR +0.526), while their main competitor for the final semifinal place, New Zealand, also has four points but a lower net run-rate (-0.245).The defeat leaves India, co-hosts and pre-tournament favourites, teetering on the brink of elimination, with their semi-final hopes now resting on the outcomes of the remaining two group matches.India will next face New Zealand on Thursday, followed by their final group match against Bangladesh on October 26.A win in both games would guarantee a spot in the semifinals.If they lose to New Zealand, India will need the White Ferns to lose their last match against England and then beat Bangladesh to advance.There‚Äôs also a third scenario. If India beat New Zealand but lose to Bangladesh, and New Zealand defeat England, the team with the better net run-rate will progress.Against England, India looked on course for victory for much of the chase. Skipper Smriti Mandhana scored a commanding 88, while Harmanpreet Kaur contributed 70 and Deepti Sharma added 50.With India needing 56 runs off 54 balls and seven wickets in hand, the match seemed under control. However, England fought back brilliantly to clinch the win. Heather Knight‚Äôs classy 109 off 91 balls, in her 300th international appearance, had earlier anchored England‚Äôs total of 288/8, with Amy Jones contributing 56.India‚Äôs bowlers triggered a late collapse, but Linsey Smith and Sophie Ecclestone sealed England‚Äôs triumph in the final overs.‚ÄúIt‚Äôs a bad feeling when you have put so much hard work in but the last 5-6 overs didn‚Äôt go according to the plan,‚Äù Harmanpreet said after the match. ‚ÄúSmriti‚Äôs wicket was the turning point for us. It‚Äôs a heartbreaking moment. Credit to England. They didn‚Äôt lose hope, they kept bowling and getting wickets.‚Äù
Article Summary: India's world cup campaign is on a knife-edge after another agonising defeat. Chasing a target of 289 against england in indore, india fell just four runs short. India currently sit fourth in the points table with four points from five matches.

Article Title: 'Do you have MS Dhoni's?': R Ashwin exposes fake Adam Zampa, reveals chat
Article Text:
R Ashwin and MS Dhoni (BCCI Photo)

Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma, R Ashwin, Cheteshwar Pujara retire... who next?

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll What‚Äôs your view on criticism of players on social media? It helps them improve It can be harmful

NEW DELHI: Indian spinner Ravichandran Ashwin recently found himself in a humorous situation when a person impersonating Australian cricketer Adam Zampa contacted him on WhatsApp, asking for the phone numbers of several Indian players.Ashwin shared screenshots of the conversation on Instagram, captioning it ‚ÄúFake Adam Zampa tries to strike.‚Äù The post quickly went viral, with fans loving Ashwin‚Äôs sharp and witty replies to the impersonator.The fake Zampa asked Ashwin for the contact details of players such as Abhishek Sharma, Jasprit Bumrah, Sanju Samson, Jitesh Sharma, Rinku Singh, and Shivam Dube. Ashwin decided to play along, joking that he would send the list and asking if those names were enough.He then turned the tables by asking the impersonator if he had MS Dhoni‚Äôs number. When the fake Zampa replied that he did, Ashwin requested the number in return. The chat ended on a hilarious note, with Ashwin quipping that he was ‚ÄúCompiling in Excel‚Äù when the impersonator again pressed for the contacts.This wasn‚Äôt Ashwin‚Äôs first brush with online impostors. He revealed a similar incident involving someone pretending to be his former Chennai Super Kings teammate Devon Conway."After the IPL got over, one guy messaged me, claiming to be Devon Conway, 'Hi buddy, how are you?' and I also responded, 'We'll stay in touch. You're playing in MLC; I'll watch the games.' He then asked, 'I've lost Virat Kohli's number, can you share it?' I thought, why is he asking for Virat's number? I thought I should ask him, but I didn't want Devon Conway to misunderstand. Then I picked up Virat Kohli's card and gave him a different number," Ashwin shared on his YouTube channel.In a separate development, Ashwin recently defended pacer Harshit Rana after earlier questioning his inclusion in India‚Äôs ODI squad against Australia."I have always reiterated that no player should be attacked below the belt. When the attack becomes too personal, the genre changes. I would like to talk about Sanjay Manjrekar, who has criticised me throughout my career. But I have never held any grudge against him. What they say might be right or wrong, as long as the criticism doesn't get personal, I am fine with it," Ashwin stated on his YouTube channel.Ashwin also voiced his concern over the psychological toll of harsh social media criticism on young players."Assume Harshit sees the reel in which he is being harshly criticised, and he is about to play a match for India, wouldn't he be shattered by this? And if his parents and friends see it, what will be their mindset? We can definitely criticise their skill, their style of cricket and the trade that they are plying. But it shouldn't get personal. It may be funny once or twice, but it shouldn't be a running theme. The reason they are doing this is that there is an audience for it. Negativity sells these days. They sell whatever is in demand. We should avoid consuming such content," he added.
Article Summary: Ravichandran ashwin was contacted on whatsapp by a person pretending to be adam zampa. The fake zampa asked ashwin for the contact details of several indian players. Ashwin decided to play along, joking that he would send the list and asking if those names were enough.

Article Title: 'Harshit Rana is Haris Rauf of India': Indian cricketer trolled hilariously after defeat to Australia
Article Text:
Harshit Rana of India (Photo by Paul Kane/Getty Images)

'Unfair at this stage!': Virat Kohli's childhood coach on the treatment of senior duo Virat-Rohit

India face mounting pressure following their disappointing loss in the first ODI against Australia at Perth's Optus Stadium. The match, which was initially anticipated as a celebratory return for Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli, resulted in India conceding a 1-0 series lead.Australia won the toss and elected to field first. The Indian batting lineup struggled to cope with the challenging conditions in a rain-affected match.India managed to score 136/9 in their allocated 26 overs, with the target being adjusted to 131 for Australia through DRS. Both Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli had brief stays at the crease, scoring 8 off 14 balls and 0 off 6 balls respectively.In the bowling department, Arshdeep Singh provided an early breakthrough by dismissing Travis Head. However, the Australian team comfortably achieved the target with seven wickets in hand and 29 balls remaining.The entire Indian bowling attack appeared ineffective, with Harshit Rana receiving particularly harsh criticism from fans. His selection for the series has been a topic of debate, with some suggesting his inclusion was influenced by his association with coach Gautam Gambhir Rana's performance in his four-over spell yielded no wickets while conceding 27 runs.This outcome has intensified the scrutiny surrounding his selection and capabilities at the international level.The Indian team now needs to regroup quickly as they prepare for the second match of the three-game series. The upcoming game is scheduled for October 23rd in Adelaide.The pressure will be particularly intense for Harshit Rana, who needs to prove his worth at the international level. A loss in the next match would put India in a difficult position to salvage the series.The match has highlighted concerns about team selection and performance under pressure. The Indian team's ability to bounce back will be tested in the upcoming Adelaide fixture.The rain-interrupted nature of the first match added to the complexity of the game, but the overall performance has raised questions about the team's adaptability in challenging conditions.India's batting collapse in the shortened format and the inability of their bowling unit to defend even a modest target has become a point of concern for the team management.The return of senior players Rohit and Kohli was expected to strengthen the team, but their early dismissals contributed to India's struggles in the match.The upcoming match in Adelaide presents an opportunity for the team to address these issues and level the series. The focus will be on both individual and collective improvement.Australia's commanding performance in chasing down the target has put additional pressure on India to respond strongly in the second ODI.The loss has sparked discussions about team selection strategies and the balance between giving opportunities to new players while maintaining team performance at the international level.The team management faces the challenge of making necessary adjustments while maintaining confidence in their selected players ahead of the crucial second match.
Article Summary: India conceded a 1-0 series lead to australia in the three-match odi series. The indian batting lineup struggled to cope with the challenging conditions in a rain-affected match. Harshit rana's performance in his four-over spell yielded no wickets while conceding 27 runs.

Article Title: ‚ÄúShe doesn‚Äôt need my money‚Äù: Christian McCaffrey‚Äôs fierce defense of Olivia Culpo shows their love is built on respect
Article Text:
Former Miss Universe Olivia Culpo and San Francisco Forty-Niners star Christian McCaffrey have welcomed their first child. Daughter Colette Annalise was born in July 2025. Their journey began with social media interactions in 2019. They married in Rhode Island in June 2024. This new parenthood marks a significant milestone for the couple.

From social media sparks to a fairytale wedding in Rhode Island

A new chapter of love, faith, and family

Former Miss Universe Olivia Culpo and San Francisco 49ers star Christian McCaffrey have officially entered a new chapter of their picture-perfect love story, becoming parents. The couple, who welcomed their first child, daughter Colette Annalise, in July 2025, are celebrating a milestone that feels years in the making for fans who have followed their journey from flirtatious Instagram likes to walking down the aisle.Their romance began in 2019, when McCaffrey liked one of Culpo‚Äôs Instagram posts, a simple gesture that fans now see as the start of something special. Just months later, the two were spotted vacationing in Mexico, confirming the rumors that a new power couple was emerging. By the end of the year, Culpo proudly wore McCaffrey‚Äôs jersey at a Panthers game, and soon after, they made their relationship Instagram official.Over the years, the model and the athlete became one another‚Äôs biggest supporters, Culpo cheering from the sidelines and McCaffrey publicly defending her from online criticism.The NFL star once wrote, ‚ÄúShe doesn‚Äôt need my money bubbs,‚Äù after a rude comment surfaced, reminding fans that his admiration for her goes beyond fame.Their shared milestones, including McCaffrey‚Äôs trade to the 49ers in 2022 and Culpo‚Äôs continued modeling success, only strengthened their bond.Their June 2024 wedding in Rhode Island was nothing short of a modern fairytale. Culpo told Vogue her goal was simplicity and grace: ‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt want it to exude sex in any way, shape, or form. I wanted it to feel effortless and as if it‚Äôs complimenting me, not overpowering me.‚ÄùJust months after their wedding, Culpo revealed her pregnancy in March 2025 with the heartfelt caption, ‚Äúnext chapter, motherhood ü§ç.‚Äù Now, with baby Colette‚Äôs arrival, the couple‚Äôs once-glamorous love story has transformed into a beautiful family narrative.Culpo later reflected on the experience, calling motherhood ‚Äúthe scariest and most rewarding of all experiences.‚Äù For two people who built their relationship on faith, loyalty, and admiration, their growing family marks the ultimate touchdown, one filled with love, humility, and the promise of a lifetime together.Also Read: ‚ÄúNever fails to blow me away‚Äù: Travis Kelce is all praises for Patrick Mahomes‚Äô relentless drive as Chiefs reclaim their dominance
Article Summary: Former miss universe olivia culpo and san francisco forty-niners star christian mccaffrey have welcomed their first child. Daughter colette annalise was born in july 2025. Their journey began with social media interactions in 2019. They married in rhode island in june 2024.

Article Title: ‚ÄúNever fails to blow me away‚Äù: Travis Kelce is all praises for Patrick Mahomes‚Äô relentless drive as Chiefs reclaim their dominance
Article Text:
Travis Kelce highlighted Patrick Mahomes' unwavering commitment to improvement as the driving force behind the Kansas City Chiefs' enduring success. Mahomes' consistent pursuit of excellence sets the tone for the entire team, fostering a culture where complacency is nonexistent and continuous growth is prioritized, even after multiple Super Bowl victories.

Travis Kelce says Patrick Mahomes‚Äô hunger for improvement sets the tone for everyone

Patrick Mahomes‚Äô leadership continues to inspire a championship mentality

Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce once again showed why his bond with Patrick Mahomes is one of the strongest in NFL history, not just on the field, but in the locker room as well. Following the Chiefs‚Äô dominant 31‚Äì0 win over the Raiders, Kelce opened up about Mahomes‚Äô mindset and leadership, giving fans a glimpse into what keeps Kansas City‚Äôs dynasty alive.Despite the Chiefs facing early-season struggles and public doubts about their offensive chemistry, Kelce made it clear that Mahomes‚Äô work ethic has never wavered. ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs just always gonna do what he can to get better,‚Äù Kelce said, reflecting on his quarterback‚Äôs consistent pursuit of excellence.The two-time MVP‚Äôs preparation and drive have defined the team‚Äôs culture under Andy Reid, creating an atmosphere where complacency simply doesn‚Äôt exist. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs why I love playing with him,‚Äù Kelce added. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs why this team is gonna get better throughout the year, because we all have that mentality.‚ÄùEven after multiple Super Bowl titles, the Chiefs‚Äô leaders continue to emphasize growth over glory. Mahomes‚Äô commitment has turned improvement into a habit, one that teammates mirror in every practice and game.Kelce emphasized that Mahomes‚Äô example sets the ‚Äútempo‚Äù for the entire roster.‚ÄúCoach challenges us,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs one of those things... you see Pat doing it and it sets the tempo. It never fails to blow me away how good that guy can be.‚ÄùThat tempo has once again become Kansas City‚Äôs signature weapon. After being labeled as ‚Äúin crisis‚Äù just weeks ago, the Chiefs have silenced critics with renewed focus and energy. Kelce‚Äôs words highlight a simple truth, Mahomes‚Äô leadership isn‚Äôt just about his arm; it‚Äôs about his impact.As the Chiefs look to defend their dominance in a stacked AFC, their secret weapon remains the same: an unbreakable partnership between two players who demand greatness from each other and deliver it every time.Also Read: ‚ÄúThis boy has my whole heart‚Äù: Brittany Mahomes gushes over Patrick as she reveals how their love survived fame and NFL glory
Article Summary: Travis kelce says patrick mahomes' hunger for improvement sets the tone for everyone on the team. Mahomes‚Äô commitment has turned improvement into a habit, one that teammates mirror in every practice and game. After being labeled as ‚Äúin crisis‚Äù just weeks ago, the chiefs have silenced critics with renewed focus.

Article Title: Shane Beamer speaks out amid Virginia Tech rumors while vowing to refocus South Carolina for a comeback
Article Text:
Shane Beamer (Image credits: IG/X)

Shane Beamer dismisses Virginia Tech rumors and tells players he‚Äôs fully committed to South Carolina

South Carolina‚Äôs struggles only reinforce Beamer‚Äôs determination to fix the program

Virginia Tech legacy makes headlines, but Beamer‚Äôs future remains firmly in Columbia

Amid a turbulent start to the season and swirling speculation linking him to Virginia Tech, South Carolina coach Shane Beamer made it clear on Sunday that his focus is entirely on his team. With the Gamecocks struggling in the SEC, Beamer reassured both players and fans that his commitment to Columbia has not wavered, and his energy is dedicated to turning around a disappointing start.Beamer addressed a CBS Sports report claiming multiple members of Virginia Tech‚Äôs search committee were advocating for his return. The 48-year-old coach, who played at Virginia Tech and later served as an assistant under his father, Hall of Famer Frank Beamer, said the report had no basis and his loyalty lies firmly with South Carolina.‚ÄúI have no idea where that story came from,‚Äù Beamer said during his Sunday teleconference. ‚ÄúI have conveyed publicly many times how much I want to be here. This is my dream job. I said that when I came here, nothing has changed. I am pissed off at the way we are performing right now, and it's not acceptable. I came here to win a championship, and right now we're not getting it done, and my focus right now is on getting it fixed. ... We're in a storm right now that I‚Äôm going to get us out of.‚ÄùHe told his team personally that any notion of him seeking a ‚Äúparachute‚Äù or soft landing elsewhere was false, emphasizing that all his attention is on improving the team‚Äôs performance.Saturday‚Äôs 26-7 loss to No. 14 Oklahoma dropped the Gamecocks to 3-4 overall and 1-4 in SEC play, highlighting a rough patch after a 9-4 season last year. Despite the challenges, Beamer insists that this is a moment to double down on accountability and rebuild the team‚Äôs culture.‚ÄúWhen you‚Äôre 3-4, there‚Äôs all kinds of noise and chatter and speculation out there about all kinds of things,‚Äù Beamer said. ‚ÄúI wanted to make sure our players understood that I‚Äôm not focused on anything but getting this right. And that I‚Äôm gonna get it right.‚ÄùBeamer‚Äôs connections to Virginia Tech are deep ‚Äî he played there from 1995-99 and was an assistant under his father from 2011-15. Frank Beamer, South Carolina‚Äôs coaching legend, built the Hokies into a national powerhouse. Yet Shane‚Äôs commitment to South Carolina is reinforced by a contract through 2030 that pays $8.15 million this season, with a $5 million buyout if he departs early.While speculation may continue, Beamer‚Äôs message is clear: his energy, focus, and loyalty remain with the Gamecocks as he works to turn around a difficult season.Also read: Aryna Sabalenka and boyfriend Georgios Frangulis‚Äô relationship timeline: A complete look at their romance, support, and viral moments so far
Article Summary: South carolina coach shane beamer dismissed speculation linking him to virginia tech. Beamer told his team that any notion of him seeking a ‚Äúparachute‚Äù or soft landing elsewhere was false. The gamecocks are 3-4 and 1-4 in the sec after a disappointing start.

Article Title: Brock Purdy injury update: How long will the 49ers quarterback be sidelined with his toe injury?
Article Text:
Brock Purdy injury update (AP Photos)

Brock Purdy injury update : What it means for the 49ers



49ers‚Äô Season outlook hinges on Brock Purdy‚Äôs recovery



San Francisco 49ers fans are holding their breath as Brock Purdy‚Äôs lingering turf toe injury drags on, threatening to derail the team‚Äôs early-season momentum. What was first seen as a minor setback in Week 1 against the Seahawks has snowballed into a prolonged absence, leaving the 49ers leaning on backup Mac Jones. Every update seems to bring more uncertainty, and with playoff hopes on the line, the pressure is mounting both on Purdy and the team.Purdy suffered the injury in the season opener against the Seattle Seahawks and briefly returned in Week 4 against the Jacksonville Jaguars, only to aggravate the toe. NBC reporter Melissa Stark shared that Purdy described the injury as ‚Äúso annoying‚Äù and cautioned that ‚Äúany movement in the wrong direction could set him back.‚Äù The quarterback is dealing with a hyperextension of his right big toe, which tore stabilizing ligaments under the joint‚Äîa serious injury that limits planting and pushing off, vital movements for any quarterback.Despite optimism for a potential Week 8 return against the Houston Texans, Purdy himself stressed that he remains ‚Äútruly day-to-day.‚Äù The cautious approach is understandable, given the severity of turf toe and the risk of further setbacks if he returns too soon.Meanwhile, Mac Jones has guided the 49ers to a 3-1 record in his first five starts, proving capable but still unable to replicate the full impact of Purdy‚Äôs presence on the field.Purdy‚Äôs absence couldn‚Äôt come at a worse time. After signing a five-year, $265 million extension, he is the cornerstone of San Francisco‚Äôs offense, and the team‚Äôs strategy revolves around his return. With key players like Nick Bosa and Fred Warner sidelined for the season, and multiple injuries across the wide receiver corps, the 49ers are navigating a challenging roster landscape.San Francisco‚Äôs medical staff is prioritizing long-term health over rushing Purdy back, hoping that a full recovery will allow him to return stronger for the second half of the season. The team remains atop the NFC West at 4-2, but their ceiling is undeniably higher with Purdy at quarterback. Fans can only wait and hope that the star signal-caller returns at full strength, ready to steer the 49ers deep into the playoffs.Also Read: Who Are Kirk Cousins‚Äô Parents? Meet Mary Ann and Don and discover how they shaped his life
Article Summary: Brock purdy's turf toe injury threatens to derail the 49ers' early-season momentum. The quarterback is dealing with a hyperextension of his right big toe, which tore stabilizing ligaments under the joint. The 49ers medical staff is prioritizing long-term health over rushing purdy back, hoping that a full recovery will allow him to return stronger.

Article Title: Virat Kohli steps aside, pushes Shubman Gill and Shreyas Iyer to walk first - WATCH
Article Text:
Virat Kohli (Getty Images)

'Unfair at this stage!': Virat Kohli's childhood coach on the treatment of senior duo Virat-Rohit

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Who do you think will perform better in the second ODI? Virat Kohli Rohit Sharma

NEW DELHI: A lot of anticipation surrounded the first ODI in Perth, which India lost by seven wickets (DLS), as two of the game‚Äôs stalwarts, Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma , returned to the side after months. Both players had already retired from T20Is and Tests, making their comeback in the highly anticipated series opener against Australia at Optus Stadium even more significant.For Kohli, it marked his first ODI appearance since lifting the Champions Trophy on March 9 in Dubai.Virat was in a jovial mood from the start, interacting with teammates, sharing laughs, and cracking jokes.Ahead of the match, during the national anthem, he stopped and asked captain Shubman Gill and vice-captain Shreyas Iyer to lead the team and stand first in the line.However, Kohli‚Äôs return ended in disappointing fashion, as he was dismissed for a duck.Watch the video here Australia‚Äôs spin-bowling all-rounder Cooper Connolly dived to his left to complete the catch at point. Mitchell Starc thus became the second bowler to dismiss Kohli for a duck twice across all internationals, after James Anderson.Before Kohli‚Äôs exit, Rohit Sharma‚Äôs eagerly awaited comeback was short-lived. Making his 500th international appearance for India, Rohit was dismissed for eight runs by Josh Hazlewood after edging the ball to second slip, where debutant Matthew Renshaw took the catch.India now turn their attention to the second ODI against Australia, scheduled for Thursday at Adelaide Oval, Adelaide, hoping to bounce back and level the series after a tough start in Perth.
Article Summary: India lost the first odi against australia by seven wickets in perth. Virat kohli and rohit sharma returned to the side for the first time in months. Both players had already retired from t20is and tests. The second odi is scheduled for thursday at adelaide oval, adelaide.

Article Title: 'Don't be surprised if Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli ... ': Sunil Gavaskar's big comment
Article Text:
Viat Kohli and Rohit Sharma returned to international cricket after a seven-month break but struggled on Perth‚Äôs challenging surface, scoring 0 and 8 respectively. (Image credit: Agencies)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

'Unfair at this stage!': Virat Kohli's childhood coach on the treatment of senior duo Virat-Rohit

Arshdeep Singh Press Conference After IND vs AUS 1st ODI: Praises Captain Gill, Backs Virat Kohli

NEW DELHI: Cricket legend Sunil Gavaskar has expressed confidence that Indian stalwarts Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma will bounce back strongly in the second ODI against Australia in Adelaide, following their disappointing returns in Perth. Gavaskar said it would be no surprise if the two senior batters deliver big scores, emphasising that it‚Äôs only a matter of time and practice before they regain their rhythm.Kohli and Rohit returned to international cricket after a seven-month break but struggled on Perth‚Äôs challenging surface, scoring 0 and 8 respectively. Australia capitalised on India‚Äôs batting collapse to secure a comfortable seven-wicket win, taking a 1-0 lead in the three-match series.Gavaskar defended the duo, stressing that adjusting to Perth‚Äôs bounce after such a long layoff was always going to be difficult.‚ÄúThey were playing on probably the bounciest pitch in Australia. It wasn‚Äôt going to be easy, especially for players who haven‚Äôt played international cricket for a couple of months. It was challenging even for Shubman Gill and Shreyas Iyer, who play regularly,‚Äù Gavaskar was quoted as saying by India Today.The former India captain remained optimistic about India‚Äôs prospects, pointing out that once Kohli and Rohit spend more time at the crease and in the nets, they‚Äôll quickly rediscover their touch.‚ÄúIndia are still a very, very good team. Don‚Äôt be surprised if Rohit and Kohli score big in the next two games. The more they play, the more time they spend in the nets, the quicker they‚Äôll find their rhythm. Once they‚Äôre back among the runs, India‚Äôs total will be 300, 300-plus,‚Äù Gavaskar added.The second ODI in Adelaide presents ideal conditions for a turnaround, particularly for Kohli, who has an outstanding record at the venue.In four ODIs at Adelaide Oval, he has scored 244 runs at an average of 61, including two centuries.His Test record there is even more remarkable, with 537 runs in five matches at an average of 53.70, featuring three hundreds.
Article Summary: Viat kohli and rohit sharma returned to international cricket after a seven-month break. They struggled on perth‚Äôs challenging surface, scoring 0 and 8 respectively. Gavaskar said it would be no surprise if the two senior batters deliver big scores.

Article Title: Women's World Cup: 'Despite losses, our morale remains high' - Deepti Sharma
Article Text:
VISAKHAPATNAM, INDIA - OCTOBER 12: Deepti Sharma of India looks on during the ICC Women's Cricket World Cup India 2025 match between India and Australia at Dr. Y.S. Rajasekhara Reddy ACA-VDCA Cricket Stadium on October 12, 2025 in Visakhapatnam, India. (Photo by Pankaj Nangia/Getty Images)

Indore:

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Poll Do you think India will secure a spot in the World Cup semifinals? Yes, they will win at least two matches. No, they will struggle in the remaining matches.

Despite two consecutive three-wicket defeats to Australia and South Africa, India‚Äôs ace all-rounder Deepti Sharma remains optimistic about the women‚Äôs team‚Äôs World Cup campaign. Speaking to the media on Saturday, ahead of the must-win match against England at the Holkar Stadium in Indore, Sharma stated, ‚ÄúWe have lost two matches, but our morale is very good because we played two good matches at the start. ‚ÄùHosts India are set to resume their campaign after a week‚Äôs break and must win at least two of their remaining three matches to guarantee a spot in the semifinals. Sharma noted that during the hiatus, the team devised specific strategies for the remaining games.‚ÄúIt was a very good break. We have to realise how we can make better plans. As a team, we did a lot of bonding activities,‚Äù she said.India, vulnerable against left-arm spinners, will face challenges from Sophie Ecclestone and Linsey Smith on Sunday. Sharma affirmed that the team has prepared for various obstacles.Sharma holds extensive familiarity with the England squad, owing to her experience in international cricket , the Women‚Äôs Premier League (WPL) with the UP Warriorz, sharing the dressing room with Sophie Ecclestone, Danni Wyatt-Hodge and Lauren Bell, and her stint in The Hundred for the London Spirit.‚ÄúI know how their bowling and batting set-ups are, as I have played a lot of matches against them. I also know that my plan is straightforward, as it‚Äôs about how much I can enjoy being in a game.‚Äù
Article Summary: India's ace all-rounder deepti sharma remains optimistic about the women's team's world cup campaign. Hosts india are set to resume their campaign after a week‚Äôs break and must win at least two of their remaining three matches to guarantee a spot in the semifinals. Sharma affirmed that the team has prepared for various obstacles.

Article Title: Nitish Kumar Reddy makes ODI debut, receives cap from Rohit Sharma in Perth
Article Text:
Nitish Kumar Reddy (X)

'A narrative is run outside, but... ': Shubman Gill opens up on alleged tension with Rohit Sharma

India playing XI:

Australia playing XI:

Nitish Kumar Reddy officially joined India‚Äôs ODI squad on Sunday, receiving his ODI cap from Rohit Sharma at Optus Stadium in Perth. The moment marked a major milestone in the young all-rounder‚Äôs career, as he prepared to make his debut in the 50-over format.Perth has already been a special place for Nitish. It was here that he made his Test debut in the Border-Gavaskar Trophy, receiving his Test cap from Virat Kohli in 2024. He immediately made an impact with a crucial 41 in the first innings. Nitish went on to play all five Tests in the series, including a memorable century at the MCG, cementing his reputation as one of India‚Äôs most promising talents.On the same day, Australia also celebrated its debutants. Matt Renshaw and Mitch Owen were presented with their ODI caps. While Nitish‚Äôs debut carried the weight of expectation and a story of growth, Renshaw and Owen began their own journeys, full of promise and anticipation.Rohit Sharma, Shubman Gill(c), Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul(w), Axar Patel, Washington Sundar, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Harshit Rana, Mohammed Siraj, Arshdeep SinghTravis Head, Mitchell Marsh(c), Matthew Short, Josh Philippe(w), Matt Renshaw, Cooper Connolly, Mitchell Owen, Mitchell Starc, Nathan Ellis, Matthew Kuhnemann, Josh HazlewoodAustralia have won the toss and opted to field. After 223 long days, Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli are finally back in action for India, bringing their experience and firepower to the top of the order. All eyes will be on the two veterans as they step onto the field under Shubman Gill‚Äôs captaincy, marking the start of a fresh chapter in Indian ODI cricket.
Article Summary: Nitish kumar reddy officially joined india‚Äôs odi squad on sunday. He received his odi cap from rohit sharma at optus stadium in perth. Matt renshaw and mitch owen were presented with their odi caps.

Article Title: Cowboys‚Äô Trevon Diggs sidelined for Commanders clash after concussion protocol; Coach Schottenheimer confirms
Article Text:
Trevon Diggs sidelined, Cowboys‚Äô backups ready for Commanders clash (Image via: Getty Images)

Cowboys‚Äô defensive challenges with Trevon Diggs sidelined for Commanders clash



Trikweze Bridges and Caelen Carson to fill key roles in Dallas‚Äô secondary



The Dallas Cowboys will face a major defensive challenge this Sunday as star cornerback Trevon Diggs has been sidelined for the matchup against the Washington Commanders. Head coach Brian Schottenheimer confirmed Friday that Diggs entered concussion protocol following an accident at home on Thursday night, ruling him out for the upcoming game.Diggs‚Äô absence comes at a critical time for the Cowboys, whose defense is struggling this season, ranking near the bottom in both yards and points allowed. Despite this setback, Schottenheimer emphasized that the team‚Äôs defensive strategy remains intact. ‚ÄúIt doesn‚Äôt change. We adjust always on defense when we get into gamedays anyway,‚Äù he said, signaling confidence in the team‚Äôs game plan against a high-powered Commanders offense.To fill the void left by Diggs, the Cowboys will rely on backup players such as Trikweze Bridges and Caelen Carson. Bridges has impressed during practices, showing readiness to step up, while Carson could return to bolster the secondary. Schottenheimer underscored the NFL‚Äôs ‚Äúnext man up‚Äù philosophy, stressing that the team is prepared to adapt and execute its plan despite missing a key starter.The Cowboys‚Äô defensive struggles make Diggs‚Äô absence particularly significant.Analysts expect the Commanders to test Dallas‚Äô secondary early and often, putting pressure on linebackers and safeties to cover gaps and force turnovers. The performance of Bridges and Carson could be decisive in keeping the Cowboys competitive and limiting scoring opportunities for Washington.Player safety remains a top priority, and details about the severity of Diggs‚Äô condition are still emerging. Schottenheimer confirmed that Diggs was evaluated by the team‚Äôs medical staff on Friday, with updates pending as he progresses through concussion protocol. The Cowboys are focused on his well-being while preparing for a crucial NFC East matchup.As Sunday‚Äôs game approaches, the focus shifts to how the Dallas Cowboys will adjust without Trevon Diggs. The team‚Äôs ability to maintain defensive cohesion and execute its game plan will be crucial against a strong Commanders offense. Backup players like Trikweze Bridges and Caelen Carson will play a key role in sustaining the secondary‚Äôs performance during this crucial NFC East matchup.Also Read: George Kittle injury update: 49ers Star tight end set for Week 7 return; Surgeon flags re-injury risk
Article Summary: Trevon diggs has entered concussion protocol after an accident on thursday night. Head coach brian schottenheimer emphasized that the team's defensive strategy remains intact. Backup players like trikweze bridges and caelen carson will play a key role in sustaining the secondary‚Äôs performance during this crucial nfc east matchup.

Article Title: ‚ÄúThey can‚Äôt do sh*t‚Äù: Bill Belichick and Jordon Hudson caught trash talking in a leaked hot-mic
Article Text:
Bill Belichick & Jordon Hudson (Imagn Images)

Coach

The viral audio leak exposes Bill Belichick and Jordon Hudson mocking their coworkers on set

Coach

‚ÄúThey can‚Äôt do s**t.‚Äù

Fans can‚Äôt stop talking about ‚ÄúCoach‚Äù Belichick‚Äôs new off-field play call

‚ÄúDropping this before tonights UNC game is nasty work I absolutely love it,‚Äù

‚Äúthis is like the greatest car accident of all time.‚Äù

full

When you thought Bill Belichick‚Äôs off-field headlines couldn‚Äôt get any juicier, boom, a hot mic moment drops. The NFL legend and his 24-year-old girlfriend Jordon Hudson were reportedly caught on audio throwing shade at production staff during the filming of the now-defunctshow, and the internet is absolutely eating it up.The drama began when journalist Pablo Torre leaked behind-the-scenes audio from the set of, the NFL Films project that never made it to air. In the recording, Hudson can be heard questioning the graphics team, saying she doesn‚Äôt understand how they have ‚Äúfour full-time graphics people.‚ÄùBelichick, ever the no-nonsense coach, allegedly fired back with a brutal line:Hudson reportedly agreed and that‚Äôs when the internet lit up like a Fourth of July playbook. The leaked audio quickly went viral, with clips circulating across X and TikTok, and fans diving deep into the couple‚Äôs off-screen dynamic.Social media wasted zero time reacting. One fan wrote,Another joked,Belichick, 73, has been trying to reinvent his image post-Patriots, but this moment reminded everyone that his legendary bluntness doesn‚Äôt stop when the cameras are off.So far, neither Belichick nor Hudson has commented publicly on the hot mic clip. NFL Films and Pablo Torre also haven‚Äôt released theuncut audio, which leaves plenty of questions about what else might‚Äôve been said. Still, the snippet alone has done enough damage to spark a full-blown PR storm.Even without confirmation of the full context, the internet‚Äôs already made up its mind, the power couple was caught being a little too ‚Äúreal.‚ÄùWhether this leak hurts his next career move or just boosts his pop-culture status remains to be seen but Belichick‚Äôs mic may have been hot, but the internet‚Äôs reaction is even hotter.Also read - Did Aaron Rodgers just have PTSD from his Achilles injury? Fans think his shove says it all
Article Summary: The viral audio leak exposes bill belichick and jordon hudson mocking their coworkers on set. In the recording, hudson can be heard questioning the graphics team, saying she doesn‚Äôt understand how they have ‚Äúfour full-time graphics people‚Äù

Article Title: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm beyond grateful‚Ä¶‚Äù: NHL goalie Carter Hurt on making his long-awaited return and joining the Golden Knights on PTO
Article Text:
NHL goalie Carter Hurt makes his long-awaited return, joins the Golden Knights (Image via X.com)

NHL goalie Carter Hurt makes his long-awaited return, joins the Golden Knights on PTO

Revisiting Carter Hurt‚Äôs experience with the Philadelphia Flyers

Also read

Vegas Golden Knights goalie Carter Hurt has made his long-awaited return to the NHL after his controversial long court battle. After a prolonged absence from professional hockey due to the charges pressed against him of sexual assault in a high-profile case, Hurt is joining the Vegas Golden Knights on a professional contract tryout, as the team claimed on Thursday. However, reports suggest that Hart and the others are not eligible to play in games until December 1, as part of the league‚Äôs reinstatement process for him. Let‚Äô take a closer look at what the goaltender has to say about his return to the league after a long hiatus. NHL goalie Carter Hurt has made his long-awaited return to the league on Thursday, as announced by the Vegas Golden Knights on Thursday. The goalie has joined the team on a professional tryout contract basis, following a long-fought legal battle. Earlier, Hart played six seasons with the Philadelphia Flyers before stepping away from the game amid significant legal and organizational developments.Following the signing of the contract with the Golden Knights, the goaltender stated, ‚ÄúI‚Äôm beyond grateful, excited, and honored to be part of the Golden Knights.‚Äù He further said, ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs been a long road to get back to this point, getting back to playing the game of hockey, the game that I love.I‚Äôve been out of the game for a year and a half now. I‚Äôve learned a lot. I‚Äôve grown a lot. Just excited to move forward.‚ÄùOn his joining, the Vegas Golden Knights officially announced that, ‚ÄúFollowing the reinstatement decision agreed on by the National Hockey League and the National Hockey League Players‚Äô Association, goaltender Carter Hart will be joining the Vegas Golden Knights organization.‚ÄùIn addition to this, the team stated, ‚ÄúThe Golden Knights are aligned with the process and assessment that the NHL and NHLPA made in their decision. We remain committed to the core values that have defined our organization from its inception and expect that our players will continue to meet these standards moving forward.‚ÄùCarter Hart is resuming his career at the age of 27 with the Vegas Golden Knights after spending his first six seasons playing for Philadelphia. The Flyers last month ruled out bringing back Hart, whose camp communicated to general manager Daniel Briere that a fresh start was a better option.In 2024, he was among five members of Canada‚Äôs 2018 World Junior Championship team charged with sexual assault in relation to an alleged incident in London, Ontario. On July 24, 2025, Ontario Superior Court Justice Maria Carroccia acquitted Hart and the others, citing insufficient credible evidence to support the charges.After a prolonged legal battle, the NHL and NHL Players‚Äô Association later imposed a reinstatement process, stating that the players are now eligible to sign contracts beginning October 15, 2025, and to participate in regular-season games from December 1, 2025.
Article Summary: Nhl goalie carter hurt makes his long-awaited return, joins the golden knights. Hart played six seasons with the philadelphia flyers before stepping away from the game amid significant legal and organizational developments. In 2024, he was among five members of canada‚Äôs 2018 world junior championship team charged with sexual assault in relation to an alleged incident in london, ontario.
